entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
